name: BluetoothRemoteGATTDescriptor
description: The BluetoothRemoteGATTDescriptor interface of the Web Bluetooth API provides a GATT Descriptor, which provides further information about a characteristic’s value.
content:
This is an experimental technology
Check the Browser compatibility table carefully before using this in production.

The BluetoothRemoteGATTDescriptor interface of the Web Bluetooth APIprovidesa GATTDescriptor, which provides further information about a characteristic’s value.

This page describes the W3C Community GroupWeb Bluetooth API. For the Firefox OS Bluetooth API, see BluetoothGattDescriptor (Firefox OS).
